trends: There have been 10 other sightings in North Royalton
There was one other sighting in North Royalton on or around August 27th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsSame features and characteristics as previously mentioned in my other reports here during the week.. Almost same positions as before. Other than the very large white light object moving slow. tonight it appeared to change position quite rapidly. Moving approximately 20 degrees southwest in a matter of a minute or two. The red and green lighted objects tend to stay in position.
